inclusion.criterion: Undergoing elective or urgent spinal surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with an infectious disease, tumor resection, trauma cases, or Patients requiring lumbar fixation.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has carotid bruits and significant bilateral carotid stenosis. He underwent Carotid U/S that showed significant bilateral carotid stenosis, L>R.
